ShortDescription.NLSCatalog: Changes the contents of the /etc/services file.

Description.NLSCatalog: Changes the contents of the /etc/services file: the chservices command adds, deletes, or changes entries in the /etc/services file.

The entries in the /etc/services file are related to known services used in the DARPA Internet and also related to information used by the inetd server. The entries for the inetd server determine how the system handles Internet service requests.
